Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Racine
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Racine, Diversey, Cannon Drive and Lakeshore West (Nature Museum) due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Racine, Diversey, Cannon Drive and Lakeshore West (Nature Museum) due to, street blockage.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays at Kedzie Affecting 63rd-bound Green Line Service
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are experiencing a delay at Kedzie due to an injured rider. Harlem-bound service has resumed. Service updates to follow.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are experiencing a delay at Kedzie due to an injured rider. Harlem-bound service is no longer affected.

Assistance has been requested and we hope to resume service shortly.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as parallel bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines such as the Blue Line.

Updates will be posted as new information becomes available.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Service Between 54th/Cermak and Polk, then Racine (Blue Line) Stations, Only
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains operate from 54th to Polk, only, then connect w/Blue Line at Racine for continuing service, due to a disruption affecting the Lake St 'L'.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Polk and the Loop due to a service disruption affecting trains on the Lake St 'L'.

As a result, Pink Line trains are running as follows:

  • Between 54th/Cermak and Polk, and then are diverted to Racine on the Blue Line for direct connections at Racine to continuing Blue Line train service to/from downtown.

Using connecting Blue Line service:

  • For service to downtown from Pink Line stations between 54th/Cermak and Polk, take a Pink Line train toward the Loop and stay on board until the train reaches Racine on the Blue Line. Transfer to an O'Hare-bound Blue Line train from the same platform for service into downtown.

  • For service from downtown to Pink Line stations between Polk and 54th/Cermak, take a Blue Line train toward Forest Park to Racine. Stay on the same platform side and wait for a 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line train.

Other possible alternatives may include: 

  • #9 Ashland
  • #21 Cermak
  • #49 Western
  • #50 Damen
  • #52 Kedzie/California
  • #53 Pulaski
  • #54 Cicero
  • #60 Blue Island-26th
  • #82 Kimball-Homan
  • #94 South California
  • #157 Streeterville-Taylor buses

...including to/from and in combination with other 'L' services.

Note that if you take a bus to/from the Pink Line, you may also be able to connect to/from the Blue Line's Forest Park branch, directly.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
